github.notes: Create token at https://github.com/settings/tokens with repo and read permissions

sequential_thinking.notes: Built-in MCP server - no credentials needed

metadata.warning: This file contains real API credentials - never commit to version control
instructions: 2. Replace placeholder values with your real API credentials
3. Set 'enabled: true' for providers you want to test
5. Get Brave Search API key from https://api.search.brave.com/
6. Create GitHub token at https://github.com/settings/tokens with repo permissions
7. Never commit the e2e-credentials.json file to Git
